name: skill-codex (skills-directory)
description: [项目级] A claude code skill to delegate prompts to codex。来源: https://github.com/skills-directory/skill-codex

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A claude code skill to delegate prompts to codex

来源: https://github.com/skills-directory/skill-codex
语言: unknown
Stars: 603

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: This repository is structured as a [Claude Code Plugin](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/plugins) with a marketplace. You can install it as a **plugin** (recommended) or extract it as a **standalone skill**.

name: skill-codex/plugins 模块
description: [模块级] skill-codex 项目的 plugins 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/skills-directory/skill-codex

genes.title: plugins 模块说明
genes.content:
模块路径: plugins/
类型: source
文件数: 6

包含文件:
- plugins/skill-codex
- plugins/skill-codex/.claude-plugin
- plugins/skill-codex/.claude-plugin/plugin.json
- plugins/skill-codex/skills
- plugins/skill-codex/skills/codex
- plugins/skill-codex/skills/codex/SKILL.md
